content: In 1969, which British rock band released the concept album "Tommy," featuring the story of a deaf, dumb, and blind boy who becomes a pinball champion?

The British rock band that released the concept album "Tommy" in 1969 is The Who. The album tells the story of Tommy, a deaf, dumb, and blind boy who becomes a pinball champion and a spiritual leader in his community. The album was a critical and commercial success and is considered one of the greatest rock operas of all time.
